divs: sighting detailsit was red and orange and yellow. it came from behind me as i was fishing. i was on the south side of muskegon lake and i went to cast out my real and i heard this strange unique sound\ there was also, asi was about to cast my reel, i not only heard the sound but there was an orangish red glow on the lake. it was very breezy that night and when i turned around to see what it was, my mouth just dropped as i stand stairing into this hug light just sitting over the channel going into the lake. it just sat in mid air and didnt move at all\ i dropped my fishing pole and ran to my jeep and grabbed my cellphone. as soon as i had the phone in my hand, that object\light\ufo started to move slowly towards the north of the lake. it was not going very fast, so i've never used my video recorder and it took me a few mins to get it up and running but i got it to record the ufo. there are parts in the video i recorded that the object appears to moving super fast. that was actually my hands shaking as i was recording and talking to myself like an idiot..lol i was scared, all the birds flew away when it started to move and when i tried to zoom in on it, it went really fast up in the sky and vanished into nowhere. never saw it again. there may be the same video on what i am sending twice. it is in a folder with the ufo i saw in ventura, calf a week later which you guys told me this was a hoax. i hope this one isnt and i did repeat myself in each video clip )sorry for that) i was pretty frightend being in the dark all alone with this thing and really nowhere to go but into a lake to hide from it. the weirdest thing is, that it sat and hovered behind me and didnt move even while i ran to my car, it only started to move once i grabbed my cellphone. any ways, please get back to me and let me know what i recorded if at all possible. it was not a fire floating lantern either, unless they make them huge with motors that can go up into the sky and at a fast speed and vanish. thank you for your time i look forward to your reply.
Summary: It was red and orange and yellow. It came from behind me as I was fishing
